title: 4.1 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a web page on the topic My Favorite Food Items. Insert images of food items you like, using image tags. Write a paragraph about each item. Use the required HTML tags to structure your web page.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
